long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically tracks time from Jira to Redmine. When you track time in Jira, it creates a time record in the specified Redmine issue with link to the Jira task in comments.

You have to set the extension properties before usage.
